Title: Relates to instant run-off elections in N.Y. city; repealer
Summary: Relates to instant run-off elections in the city of New York for any city-wide elections for the office of mayor, public advocate or comptroller.
LawCode: Rpld & add ยง6-162, amd ยง7-114, El L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to instant run-off voting in the city of New York; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
